about.title: About Me

about.description: With expertise spanning cybersecurity operations, threat analysis, and security architecture, I specialize in developing comprehensive security strategies for financial sectors and government organizations. My approach combines cutting-edge technology with practical implementation to deliver robust cybersecurity solutions.
